title: Burn You All Night: The Spinster’s Body Trade - Novel Updates
tags: Adultery   Affair   Bickering Couple   Female Protagonist
author: 苏七七
description:
On her wedding day, she is betrayed by her sister and her fiancé. 

But she has to choke down this insult for the family’s face. 

Shen Jiayi, who has been a well-behaved girl for over twenty years, chooses to indulge herself one night.

Originally thought it is merely physical, while she is spoiled by him so much!>
